Prioritize user-facing, role-based locators (\u003ccode\u003eGetByRole\u003c/code\u003e, \u003ccode\u003eGetByLabel\u003c/code\u003e, \u003ccode\u003eGetByText\u003c/code\u003e, etc.) for resilience and accessibility. Use \u003ccode\u003eawait Test.StepAsync()\u003c/code\u003e to group interactions and improve test readability and reporting.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAssertions\u003c/strong\u003e: Use auto-retrying web-first assertions. These assertions use \u003ccode\u003eExpect()\u003c/code\u003e from Playwright assertions (e.g., \u003ccode\u003eawait Expect(locator).ToHaveTextAsync()\u003c/code\u003e). Avoid checking visibility unless specifically testing for visibility changes.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTimeouts\u003c/strong\u003e: Rely on Playwright's built-in auto-waiting mechanisms. Avoid hard-coded waits or increased default timeouts.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eClarity\u003c/strong\u003e: Use descriptive test and step titles that clearly state the intent. Add comments only to explain complex logic or non-obvious interactions.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"markdown-heading\" dir=\"auto\"\u003e\u003ch3 tabindex=\"-1\" class=\"heading-element\" dir=\"auto\"\u003eTest Structure\u003c/h3\u003e\u003ca id=\"user-content-test-structure\" class=\"anchor\" aria-label=\"Permalink: Test Structure\" href=\"#test-structure\"\u003e\u003csvg class=\"octicon octicon-link\" viewBox=\"0 0 16 16\" version=\"1.1\" width=\"16\" height=\"16\" aria-hidden=\"true\"\u003e\u003cpath d=\"m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z\"\u003e\u003c/path\u003e\u003c/svg\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cul dir=\"auto\"\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eUsings\u003c/strong\u003e: Start with \u003ccode\u003eusing Microsoft.Playwright;\u003c/code\u003e and either \u003ccode\u003eusing Microsoft.Playwright.Xunit;\u003c/code\u003e or \u003ccode\u003eusing Microsoft.Playwright.NUnit;\u003c/code\u003e or \u003ccode\u003eusing Microsoft.Playwright.MSTest;\u003c/code\u003e for MSTest.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eOrganization\u003c/strong\u003e: Create test classes that inherit from \u003ccode\u003ePageTest\u003c/code\u003e (available in NUnit, xUnit, and MSTest packages) or use \u003ccode\u003eIClassFixture\u0026lt;PlaywrightFixture\u0026gt;\u003c/code\u003e for xUnit with custom fixtures. Group related tests for a feature in the same test class.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eSetup\u003c/strong\u003e: Use \u003ccode\u003e[SetUp]\u003c/code\u003e (NUnit), \u003ccode\u003e[TestInitialize]\u003c/code\u003e (MSTest), or constructor initialization (xUnit) for setup actions common to all tests (e.g., navigating to a page).\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTitles\u003c/strong\u003e: Use the appropriate test attribute (\u003ccode\u003e[Test]\u003c/code\u003e for NUnit, \u003ccode\u003e[Fact]\u003c/code\u003e for xUnit, \u003ccode\u003e[TestMethod]\u003c/code\u003e for MSTest) with descriptive method names following C# naming conventions (e.g., dir=\"auto\"\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eLocation\u003c/strong\u003e: Store all test files in a \u003ccode\u003eTests/\u003c/code\u003e directory or organize by feature.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eNaming\u003c/strong\u003e: Use the convention \u003ccode\u003e\u0026lt;FeatureOrPage\u0026gt;Tests.cs\u003c/code\u003e (e.g., \u003ccode\u003eLoginTests.cs\u003c/code\u003e, \u003ccode\u003eSearchTests.cs\u003c/code\u003e).\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eScope\u003c/strong\u003e: Aim for one test class per major application feature or page.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"markdown-heading\" dir=\"auto\"\u003e\u003ch3 tabindex=\"-1\" class=\"heading-element\" class="prc-TooltipV2-Tooltip-tLeuB" data-direction="n" aria-hidden="true" id=":R4ecpal9lab:">Outline</span><div class="react-blob-header-edit-and-raw-actions-combined"><button data-component="IconButton" type="button" title="More file actions" data-testid="more-file-actions-button" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" class="prc-Button-ButtonBase-9n-Xk IconButton__StyledIconButton-sc-i53dt6-0 js-blob-dropdown-click BlobViewHeader-module__IconButton--uO1fA prc-Button-IconButton-fyge7" data-loading="false" data-no-visuals="true" data-size="small" data-variant="invisible" aria-labelledby=":Rfkucpal9lab:" id=":Rkucpal9lab:"><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="octicon octicon-kebab-horizontal" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" actions</span></div></div></div></div><div></div></div><div class="Box-sc-62in7e-0 dIDnLY"><section aria-labelledby="file-name-id-wide file-name-id-mobile" class="Box-sc-62in7e-0 iZiBDT"><div <div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Playwright .NET Test Generation Instructions</h1><a id="user-content-playwright-net-test-generation-instructions" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Playwright .NET Test Generation Instructions" href="#playwright-net-test-generation-instructions"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Test Writing Guidelines</h2><a id="user-content-test-writing-guidelines" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Test Writing Guidelines" href="#test-writing-guidelines"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Code Quality Standards</h3><a id="user-content-code-quality-standards" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Code Quality Standards" href="#code-quality-standards"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong>Locators</strong>: Prioritize user-facing, role-based locators (<code>GetByRole</code>, <code>GetByLabel</code>, <code>GetByText</code>, etc.) for resilience and accessibility. Use <code>await Test.StepAsync()</code> to group interactions and improve test readability and reporting.</li>
<li><strong>Assertions</strong>: Use auto-retrying web-first assertions. These assertions use <code>Expect()</code> from Playwright assertions (e.g., <code>await Expect(locator).ToHaveTextAsync()</code>). Avoid checking visibility unless specifically testing for visibility changes.</li>
<li><strong>Timeouts</strong>: Rely on Playwright's built-in auto-waiting mechanisms. Avoid hard-coded waits or increased default timeouts.</li>
<li><strong>Clarity</strong>: Use descriptive test and step titles that clearly state the intent. Add comments only to explain complex logic or non-obvious interactions.</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Test Structure</h3><a id="user-content-test-structure" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Test Structure" href="#test-structure"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong>Usings</strong>: Start with <code>using Microsoft.Playwright;</code> and either <code>using Microsoft.Playwright.Xunit;</code> or <code>using Microsoft.Playwright.NUnit;</code> or <code>using Microsoft.Playwright.MSTest;</code> for MSTest.</li>
<li><strong>Organization</strong>: Create test classes that inherit from <code>PageTest</code> (available in NUnit, xUnit, and MSTest packages) or use <code>IClassFixture&lt;PlaywrightFixture&gt;</code> for xUnit with custom fixtures. Group related tests for a feature in the same test class.</li>
<li><strong>Setup</strong>: Use <code>[SetUp]</code> (NUnit), <code>[TestInitialize]</code> (MSTest), or constructor initialization (xUnit) for setup actions common to all tests (e.g., navigating to a page).</li>
<li><strong>Titles</strong>: Use the appropriate test attribute (<code>[Test]</code> for NUnit, <code>[Fact]</code> for xUnit, <code>[TestMethod]</code> for MSTest) with descriptive method names following C# naming conventions (e.g., <code>SearchForMovieByTitle</code>).</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">File Organization</h3><a id="user-content-file-organization" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: File Organization" href="#file-organization"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong>Location</strong>: Store all test files in a <code>Tests/</code> directory or organize by feature.</li>
<li><strong>Naming</strong>: Use the convention <code>&lt;FeatureOrPage&gt;Tests.cs</code> (e.g., <code>LoginTests.cs</code>, <code>SearchTests.cs</code>).</li>
<li><strong>Scope</strong>: Aim for one test class per major application feature or page.</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Assertion Best Practices</h3><a id="user-content-assertion-best-practices" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Assertion Best Practices" href="#assertion-best-practices"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong>UI Structure</strong>: Use <code>ToMatchAriaSnapshotAsync</code> to verify the accessibility tree structure of a component. This provides a comprehensive and accessible snapshot.</li>
<li><strong>Element Counts</strong>: Use <code>ToHaveCountAsync</code> to assert the number of elements found by a locator.</li>
<li><strong>Text Content</strong>: Use <code>ToHaveTextAsync</code> for exact text matches and <code>ToContainTextAsync</code> for partial matches.</li>
<li><strong>Navigation</strong>: Use <code>ToHaveURLAsync</code> to verify the page URL after an action.</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Example Test Structure</h2><a id="user-content-example-test-structure" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Example Test Structure" href="#example-test-structure"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-cs notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="using Microsoft.Playwright;
using Microsoft.Playwright.Xunit;
using static Microsoft.Playwright.Assertions;

namespace PlaywrightTests;

public class MovieSearchTests : PageTest
{
    public override async Task InitializeAsync()
    {
        await base.InitializeAsync();
        // Navigate to the application before each test
        await Page.GotoAsync(&quot;https://debs-obrien.github.io/playwright-movies-app&quot;);
    }

    [Fact]
    public async Task SearchForMovieByTitle()
    {
        await Test.StepAsync(&quot;Activate and perform search&quot;, async () =&gt;
        {
            await Page.GetByRole(AriaRole.Search).ClickAsync();
            var searchInput = Page.GetByRole(AriaRole.Textbox, new() { Name = &quot;Search Input&quot; });
            await searchInput.FillAsync(&quot;Garfield&quot;);
            await searchInput.PressAsync(&quot;Enter&quot;);
        });

        await Test.StepAsync(&quot;Verify search results&quot;, async () =&gt;
        {
            // Verify the accessibility tree of the search results
            await Expect(Page.GetByRole(AriaRole.Main)).ToMatchAriaSnapshotAsync(@&quot;
                - main:
                  - heading &quot;&quot;Garfield&quot;&quot; [level=1]
                  - heading &quot;&quot;search results&quot;&quot; [level=2]
                  - list &quot;&quot;movies&quot;&quot;:
                    - listitem &quot;&quot;movie&quot;&quot;:
                      - link &quot;&quot;poster of The Garfield Movie The Garfield Movie rating&quot;&quot;:
                        - /url: /playwright-movies-app/movie?id=tt5779228&amp;page=1
                        - img &quot;&quot;poster of The Garfield Movie&quot;&quot;
                        - heading &quot;&quot;The Garfield Movie&quot;&quot; [level=2]
            &quot;);
        });
    }
}"><pre><span class="pl-k">using</span> <span class="pl-s1">Microsoft</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-s1">Playwright</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

    <span class="pl-kos">}</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span></pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Test Execution Strategy</h2><a id="user-content-test-execution-strategy" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Test Execution Strategy" href="#test-execution-strategy"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ol dir="auto">
<li><strong>Initial Run</strong>: Execute tests with <code>dotnet test</code> or using the test runner in your IDE</li>
<li><strong>Debug Failures</strong>: Analyze test failures and identify root causes</li>
<li><strong>Iterate</strong>: Refine locators, assertions, or test logic as needed</li>
<li><strong>Validate</strong>: Ensure tests pass consistently and cover the intended functionality</li>
<li><strong>Report</strong>: Provide feedback on test results and any issues discovered</li>
</ol>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Quality Checklist</h2><a id="user-content-quality-checklist" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Quality Checklist" href="#quality-checklist"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">Before finalizing tests, ensure:</p>
<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" aria-label="Incomplete task"> All locators are accessible and specific and avoid strict mode violations</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" aria-label="Incomplete task"> Tests are grouped logically and follow a clear structure</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" aria-label="Incomplete task"> Assertions are meaningful and reflect user expectations</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" aria-label="Incomplete task"> Tests follow consistent naming conventions</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" aria-label="Incomplete task"> Code is properly formatted and commented</li>
</ul>
